name: Terranswarm
tagline: A task allocation approach for RTS game playing evolved with Genetic Algorithm
body:
### TerranSwarm
This page contais information on TerranSwarm bot. It is a Terran StarCraft/BWAPI bot that uses a task allocation algorithm to decide its actions. The parameters of task allocation were adjusted with a Genetic Algorithm in matches against StarCraft's native AI.

### Publications
Currently, there is one publication from this project:

- Tavares AR, Azpurua H, Chaimowicz L. _Evolving swarm intelligence for task allocation in a real time strategy game_. In Computer Games and Digital Entertainment (SBGAMES), 2014 Brazilian Symposium on, pages 99-108, November 2014. Best paper in SBGames 2014 Computing Track. - http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/SBGAMES.2014.17
